dublin_core.dcvalue: The computerisation of healthcare data in France is protected by a legal framework which professional practices sometimes overlook With the arrival of telemedicine the patient s express consent is required the purpose and consequences of which need to be explained While restricting this consent is essential for the social acceptance of the computerisation of healthcare date which offers advantages but which also harbours certain dangers
Soins; la revue de référence infirmière
[Telemedicine and patients, for the traceability of data exchanges].
